326070.name: Murder in the Hotel Lisbon - Soundtrack
326070.description:
The Murder in the Hotel Lisbon - Soundtrack includes 15 tracks in Mp3 format, just for you (yes, you!).

Tracklist:
01 - Introduction (0:48)
02 - Main Menu (0:44)
03 - Fado A Caldeirada (3:09)
04 - Wake up! (1:01)
05 - The office (1:15)
06 - Room 302 (1:05)
07 - Street's of the 80's (1:34)
08 - The Hotel Lisbon (1:38)
09 - The Police Station (1:33)
10 - Artist alley (1:05)
11 - Interviews, round 1 (0:46)
12 - Interviews, round 2 (0:41)
13 - Interviews, round 3 (0:43)
14 - Park (1:09)
15 - Credits (1:07)

Songs will be downloaded to the Murder in the Hotel Lisbon - Soundtrack folder in your Steam Directory:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\...\Murder in the Hotel Lisbon - Soundtrack
326070.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙
